This was renowned filmmaker Wong Jing's very first modern day adventure drama. In addition to writing and directing, he sent majestic superstar Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min (Five Element Ninja), Wang Lung-wei (the king of Shaw Brothers' screen villains), Lo Lieh (Shaw Brothers' first international star), and Wang Yu (Dirty Ho) on a deadly mission - all under the guidance of three great kung-fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia.
